channel.title: Using alfa adapter for whonix gateway
channel.description: Is there a way to use a wifi adapter on the whonix gateway so I can use a different connection than my host machine? I know I can do this with other simple vm's in vitualbox but the option is not available in whonix for some reason.

item.title: Using alfa adapter for whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Using alfa adapter for whonix gateway

item.description:

Is it possible to configure Whonix-Gatway through USB dongle? Support
I looked up seting on whonix gate way under conections theres a number of options. If i atatched a usb dongle woudl it show up here? it goes withe out saying thet I would like to conect one of my vm:s to this usb dongle trough whonix gate way
